mapper.select: select * from class where prof_no = ( select member_no from member where m_type = 'P' and member_id = #{memberId} ) and class_status = 'Y'
select count(*) from class where prof_no = ( select member_no from member where m_type = 'P' and member_id = #{memberId} )

select c.class_num , c.enroll_date , c.class_grade , c.class_semester , c.class_name , t.class_typename , c.class_no from class c join class_type t on c.class_type = t.class_type where c.class_status = 'Y' and c.prof_no =( select member_no from member where m_type = 'P' and member_id = #{memberId} )
select * from class c join class_type t on c.class_type = t.class_type where c.class_no = #{classNo}
mapper.update: update class set class_status = 'N' where class_no = #{classNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from class_notice cn join class c on (c.class_no = cn.ref_class_no) where cn_status = 'Y' and c.class_num = #{classNum}

select rownum as ref_class_no, class_notice_no, cn_title, cn_date, cn_count, cn_writer, class_name from ( select distinct cn.cn_title, cn.cn_date, cn.cn_count, cn.cn_writer, c.class_name, cn.class_notice_no from class_notice cn join class c ON (c.class_no = cn.ref_class_no) join course co ON (co.class_no = cn.ref_class_no) where cn_status ='Y' and c.class_num = #{classNum} and course_status = 'Y' order by class_notice_no desc )
mapper.update: update class_notice set cn_count = cn_count + 1 where class_notice_no = ( select class_notice_no from ( select class_notice_no, cn_count from ( select distinct class_notice_no, cn_count from class_notice cn join class c on c.class_no = cn.ref_class_no join course co on co.class_no = cn.ref_class_no where cn_status ='Y' and c.class_num = #{classNum} and course_status = 'Y' order by class_notice_no desc ) )where class_notice_no = #{classNoticeNo})
mapper.select: select class_notice_no , class_num , cn_title , cn_content , cn_date , cn_count , member_name , cn_change_name , cn_origin_name , class_name from class_notice join member on(cn_writer = member_no) join class on(ref_class_no = class_no) where class_notice_no = ( select class_notice_no from ( select rownum as rnum, class_notice_no , cn_writer , cn_title , cn_content , cn_date , cn_count , cn_change_name , cn_origin_name , class_name from ( select distinct cn.cn_content, cn.cn_title, cn.cn_date, cn.cn_count, cn.cn_writer, c.class_name, cn.class_notice_no, cn.cn_origin_name, cn.cn_change_name from class_notice cn join class c ON (c.class_no = cn.ref_class_no) join course co ON (co.class_no = cn.ref_class_no) where cn_status ='Y' and c.class_num = #{classNum} order by class_notice_no desc ) ) where rnum = #{classNoticeNo} ) and cn_status = 'Y'

select class_no , class_num , member_name , class_score , class_time , class_room , class_name , origin_name , change_name from class join member on(prof_no = member_no) where class_num = #{classNum} and SUBSTR(enroll_date, 1, 4) = '2024'
select count(*) from class_board join class on (class_no = ref_class_no) where cb_status = 'Y' and class_num = #{classNum}

select cb_writer , class_board_no , cb_title , cb_date , student_name , cb_count , class_name from ( select rownum as cb_writer , class_board_no , cb_title , cb_date , student_name , cb_count , class_name from ( select cb_title , class_board_no , cb_date , student_name , cb_count , class_name from class_board join student on (cb_writer = student_no) join class on (class_no = ref_class_no) where cb_status = 'Y' and class_num = #{classNum} order by class_board_no desc ) )

update class_board set cb_count = cb_count + 1 where class_board_no = ( select class_board_no from ( select class_board_no, cb_count from class_board join student on (cb_writer = student_no) join class on (class_no = ref_class_no) where cb_status = 'Y' and class_num = #{classNum} order by class_board_no desc ) where class_board_no = #{classBoardNo})

select class_board_no , student_name , cb_title , cb_content , cb_origin_name , cb_change_name , cb_count , cb_date from class_board join student on(cb_writer = student_no) join class on(ref_class_no = class_no) where class_board_no = ( select class_board_no from ( select rownum as rnum, class_board_no , student_name , cb_title , cb_content , cb_origin_name , cb_change_name , cb_count , cb_date from ( select * from class_board join student on (cb_writer = student_no) join class on (class_no = ref_class_no) where cb_status = 'Y' and class_num = #{classNum} order by class_board_no desc ) ) where rnum = #{bno} ) and cb_status = 'Y'
select origin_name , change_name from class where class_num = #{classNum} and SUBSTR(enroll_date, 1, 4) = '2024'
